quoteDoc: Terms of Service and Honor Code
quoteText: However, edX reserves the right to review User Postings and to exercise its sole discretion to edit or remove, in whole or in part, any User Posting at any time and for any reason, or to allow the edX Participants to do so.
title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
